name: 0wned
description:
0wned

  • Wave based survival
  • Scan datablobs to identify malware or benign documents before they reach your core (CPU)
  • Sit helplessly back and watch them destroy your machine because the dev ran out of time and shipped the product anyway (just like real life)
  • Malware will flow from your gateway to your core following your network routes

Unfortunately I bit off a bit more than I could handle with the scope of this project and didn't get anywhere near to where I wanted but for a first Jam project it's not too bad. There's not a whole lot to do here but feel free to play with the developer menu which can be opened with ~ and build the only building in the game (the singular tower)

I recommend building a heap of threads (the black bug things) and turning on path finding in the dev menu. You can control a Thread by clickon on it and right clicking where you want it to go or shift right clicking to queue up a path.

Enjoy
